name: DummyStock
0:
”Alexa open dummy stock”
”Alexa, ask dummy stock tell me a fact”
”Alexa, ask dummy stock give me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dummy stock
des:
Problem:
Most new investors jumping to the stock market for various making quick buck reasons, but lack of fundamental understanding about how stock market works and history price trends of the market, they are caught up by the fear of missing out, new IPO buzz, securities fraud, over-hyped opportunities and daily market maniacs news.

Solution:
The Dummy Stock skill is focused on the fundamental stock market FAQ education and help those new investors harvesting more wisdom and mastering their inner emotion behaviors. You don't just need wisdom and knowledge, but ultimately learn how to control your emotion and stop being too greedy for profit in the stock market. There is old saying is that "it is easy to understand people than your inner self".

What is next?
Phase 1:
We will conduct more in-depth researches and adding more stock market FAQ education datasets to the app.
Phase 2:
We will explore appropriate external database with more stock information reservoir.
Phase 3: 
We will add top investment gurus such as Warren Buffett and Ray Dalio's wisdom quotes to help tame your undecided stock pick mind battle in the history of greedy price wave tide.

Some other example phrases you can ask Alexa:
1) Alexa, Ask dummy stock tell me a stock market fact.
2) Alexa, Ask dummy stock tell me a stock market risk fact.
Note: If you don't ask the right example phrases, the skill may not able to answer your questions correctly.

Check out our another Alexa app called 'Daily Stock' if you want to hunt for the latest stock news across different financial channels.

Contact us if you have any advice or issues with the app.
biz2voice88@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
